subject: Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Olympic-style games at Much Wenlock, a town 150 miles northwest of London, are said to have given inspiration to Baron Pierre de Coubertin of France, the founder of the modern Games.
snippet: Olympic-style games at Much Wenlock, a town 150 miles northwest of London, are said to have given inspiration to Baron Pierre de Coubertin of France, the founder of the modern Games.
